content.query:
CREATE TABLE dwh_core.project_dimension (
    [ProjectKey] INT,
    [ProjectName] NVARCHAR(255),
    [ProjectStart] DATETIME,
    [ProjectEnd] DATETIME,
    [RevenueGenerated] INT
);
GO

-- CREATE TABLE dwh_staging.project_dimension

CREATE TABLE dwh_staging.project_dimension (
    [ProjectKey] INT,
    [ProjectName] NVARCHAR(255),
    [ProjectStart] NVARCHAR(255),
    [ProjectEnd] NVARCHAR(255),
    [RevenueGenerated] INT
);
GO

-- CREATE TABLE dwh_core.developer_dimension

CREATE TABLE dwh_core.developer_dimension (
    [DeveloperKey] INT,
    [DeveloperName] NVARCHAR(255),
    [DeveloperRole] NVARCHAR(255)
);
GO

-- CREATE TABLE dwh_staging.developer_dimension

CREATE TABLE dwh_staging.developer_dimension (
    [DeveloperKey] INT,
    [DeveloperName] NVARCHAR(255),
    [DeveloperRole] NVARCHAR(255)
);
GO

-- CREATE TABLE dwh_core.jira_git_fact

CREATE TABLE dwh_core.jira_git_fact (
    [JiraGitKey] INT,
    [JiraTicketKey] NVARCHAR(100),
    [DeveloperKey] INT,
    [StoryPoint] INT,
    [GitHubRepo] NVARCHAR(255),
    [CommitMessage] NVARCHAR(1000),
    [CommitTime] DATETIME,
    [ProjectName] NVARCHAR(255)
);
GO

-- CREATE TABLE dwh_staging.jira_git_fact

CREATE TABLE dwh_staging.jira_git_fact (
    [JiraGitKey] INT,
    [JiraTicketKey] NVARCHAR(100),
    [DeveloperKey] INT,
    [StoryPoint] INT,
    [GitHubRepo] NVARCHAR(255),
    [CommitMessage] NVARCHAR(1000),
    [CommitTime] NVARCHAR(255),
    [ProjectName] NVARCHAR(255)
);
GO
